metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0233 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Multiple insecure Temporary File vulnerabilities in 389 Administration Server before 1.1.38.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0233` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-admin - 1.1.42-1
libds-admin-serv0 - 1.1.42-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-admin package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.42-1').
